Package eu.dety.burp.joseph.utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Converter
    Help functions to convert JSON Web Key to RSA PublicKey
    ConverterTest  
    Crypto
    Help functions to perform cryptographic operations.
    CryptoTest  
    Decoder
    Help functions to encode and decode JOSE values from different representations.
    DecoderTest  
    Finder
    Help functions to find and extract JWS and JWE patterns.
    FinderTest  
    JoseParameter  
    JoseParameterTest  
    Logger
    Internal logger for the extension
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JoseParameter.JoseType
    Jose type of the parameter, might be one of: JoseParameter.JoseType.JWS JoseParameter.JoseType.JWE
    JoseParameter.OriginType
    Origin of the parameter, might be one of: JoseParameter.OriginType.PARAMETER JoseParameter.OriginType.HEADER JoseParameter.OriginType.DIRECT
    Logger.LogLevel
    LogLevel enum defining the log types, might be one of: Logger.LogLevel.ERROR Logger.LogLevel.INFO Logger.LogLevel.DEBUG
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DecryptionFailedException
    DecryptionFailedException
    InvalidJoseValueException
    DecryptionFailedException
